attributes.action: Make Roy Hodgson exclude Wayne Rooney from the England starting 11 for Euro 2016
attributes.background: We believe Roy Hodgson needs to drop Wayne Rooney from the England starting 11 in order for us to have a chance to do will at Euro 2016. Unfortunately we dont beleive Roy has the stones to make this decision hence the reason for creating this petition. Please sign and help fire the team to glory
